name: Firewall (2013)
description:
*Now available for iOS and Apple TV with cross-buy*

Firewall is a simple but addictive puzzle game where you must protect the core from incoming data, trojans and viruses. Simply spin your multi-coloured shield (or "firewall") and match the threat's colour to neutralise it and deflect it out of harms way.

Why not see how long you can survive!
